p: Since precise definition and diagnosis of type 1 and type 2 diabetes has become more difficult and very challenging, a new category of diabetes termed double or hybrid diabetes has been introduced. Double diabetes possesses symptoms of both type 1 and type 2 diabetes including obesity, insulin resistance, type of latent autoimmune diabetes in youth (LADY) autoantibodies (namely GAD56, IA2), and insulin antibodies [ 12].
